content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted multiple command lines to activate the arcgis environment, but all attempts failed due to missing files/directories. My latest attempts included sourcing various paths for conda.sh and activating arcgis, but all returned errors. I tried multiple paths for conda.sh, including /opt/anaconda, /opt/anaconda3, /opt/miniconda3, /home/atlas/miniconda. The latest development shows that I continued to try different paths for conda.sh, including /opt/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh and /home/katmai/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, but both returned errors indicating that the file or directory did not exist. Similarly, I tried sourcing /opt/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh and /home/atlas/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, but both also returned errors indicating that the file or directory did not exist.
"""
